name: Bippy
description:
Bippy is a challenging and lengthy platformer with a high skill gap.  Traverse between 3 stages of increasing difficulty using jumps, dashes, and a bunch of hidden, difficult mechanics.  All the while, avoiding various traps and spikes while collecting as many coins as you can.  How far will you get?

Bippy Features:

  • Multi-directional dash
  • Double Jump
  • Cannons
  • Spikes
  • Moving platforms
  • Coins

Bippy Progression:

  • 3 stages
  • 10 screens per stage
  • Increasing difficulty
  • 2-7 hours gameplay

Thanks to Pixel Frog and Mikiz for providing the art and some audio for this game respectively.

Warning, Bippy is a very challenging platformer.
